seo.title: Cinque Terre Maps 2025 | Hiking Trails, Villages & Transportation
seo.description: Detailed maps of Cinque Terre including hiking trails, villages, train stations, beaches, viewpoints, and transportation connections.

body.title: Cinque Terre Maps & Guides
body.subtitle: Detailed maps of hiking trails, villages, train connections, beaches, viewpoints, and all essential locations for your visit

features.title: Village Maps
features.description: Detailed layouts of all five villages with landmarks, restaurants, hotels, beaches, and viewpoints

features.title: Hiking Trail Maps
features.description: Sentiero Azzurro, sanctuary paths, high routes with distances, elevations, and difficulty ratings

features.title: Transportation Map
features.description: Train stations, ferry ports, bus stops, and connections between villages and nearby towns

features.title: Photo Spot Maps
features.description: Best viewpoints, iconic vistas, sunrise/sunset locations, and photography opportunities marked

features.title: Dining & Services
features.description: Restaurants, cafes, markets, ATMs, pharmacies, and essential services in each village

features.title: Downloadable PDFs
features.description: Print-friendly maps and offline resources for hiking and exploring without mobile coverage

body.title: Plan Your Cinque Terre Journey
body.description: Get detailed information about transportation, hiking trails, and getting to Cinque Terre
